Maria is a a single mother, head of a household of 3 children.  She looks to offer them access to a high quality education.  For this she works hard everyday in the general store that she enthusiastically started to be able to generate the income that is required in her home and be able to get ahead.  Since she set up her store the economic conditions in her home have improved considerably and this has allowed her to offer her children better opportunities to get ahead and a better quality of life.  Because she doesn't have much capital, Maria turns to a loan to be able to buy a refrigerator since the one that is in her store is damaged.

Her dream is to get ahead in this business and make it grow so her economic situation improves considerably and her children can have the opportunity to attend the university in the future.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator, since the one in her store is damaged

loans.name: Miryam Amparo

texts.es:
Miryam es madre soltera cabeza de familia y desde que tuvo su primer hijo vio la necesidad de comenzar a trabajar, y fue así cuando empezó a trabajar en salas de belleza y le gusto mucho esta actividad. Ya teniendo el conocimiento y la experiencia, inició su propio salón de belleza. Miryam ha superado con una gran fortaleza las duras adversidades que se le han presentado en la vida, pues el hecho de ser madre soltera de sus 2 hijos, tenerles que brindar una educación de buena calidad, y sostener los gastos de su hogar, han hecho que se tenga que esforzar fuertemente todos los días en su trabajo para poder salir adelante. Miryam desea seguir creciendo en su negocio y desde poder comprar los artículos de barbería que necesita para que su hijo menor comience a trabajar a su lado, ya que durante un tiempo estudió la profesión. Pero debido a que no cuenta con el capital suficiente para esto, Miryam busca un préstamo para comprar las herramientas necesarias para ofrecer el servicio de barbería en su salón de belleza.

Su sueño es poder salir adelante y superar estas duras pruebas que le ha presentado la vida. Además, aspira a que en un futuro pueda comprar su casa propia y así tener la oportunidad de ofrecerles a sus hijos un hogar más estable.
texts.en:
Miryam’s a single mother head of household.  When she had her first child she realized the need to start working and this is how she started working in beauty shops.  She liked it very much.  Once she had acquired knowledge and experience, she opened her own beauty shop.

Miryam has overcome life’s adversities with much strength because being a single mother of two children and having to provide them with a good quality education and cover household expenses has caused her to strive hard every day at work in order to get ahead.  Miryam wants to continue growing in her business and would like to buy barbering supplies so that her younger son can start working alongside her since he’s been studying the profession for some time now.  Because she does not have sufficient capital to do so, Miryam is looking for a loan to buy the necessary tools to provide barbering services in her beauty salon.

Her dream is to be able to move forward and overcome the tough challenges life has presented her with.  In addition, she hopes in the future to be able to buy her own house thus being able to provide her children with a more stable home.

loans.use: to buy beauty salon supplies.

loans.name: Eustaquio Felipe

texts.es:
Eustaquio es un hombre de 53 años, vive en la ciudad de Ica con su pareja y su pequeño hijo;  él es una persona muy amable, trabajador y entusiasta, que tiene un gran deseo por salir adelante junto con su familia; lamentablemente por tener la necesidad de trabajar y solventar sus gastos no pudo cursar una carrera profesional, pero le hubiera gustado poder estudiar la carrera de Ingeniería Civil, en sus ratos libres le gusta ver programa educativos y noticieros en televisión y en algunas ocasiones cocina un riquísimo Ají de Gallina para compartir con su familia.
Gracias a su espíritu emprendedor y al apoyo de su familia, Eustaquio se desempeña en el rubro de la construcción, él es maestro de obras, desde tempranas horas de la mañana dedica un aproximado de 10 horas diarias a su labor, mensualmente puede atender un promedio de 5 clientes, él se encuentra a gusto realizando su trabajo. 
Eustaquio se encuentra muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva, ya que gracias a la ayuda brindada podrá realizar la compra de materiales para sus obras, tales como: maderas, clavos, cubos, sogas, entre otros; de esta manera Eustaquio podrá contar con las herramientas necesarias para realizar su trabajo y con ello espera poder atender a mas clientes e incrementar su ingresos económicos, los cuales desea utilizar para asegurar la educación u bienestar de su pequeño hijo.
texts.en:
Eustaquio, 53, lives in the city of Ica with his spouse and young son.  He’s a very kind, hardworking, enthusiastic person who very much wants to get ahead with his family.  Unfortunately, because he needed to work and cover expenses he was unable to study a professional career but he would have liked to have studied civil engineering.  In his free time he enjoys watching informative programs and news on television and sometimes cooks a delicious “Ají de Gallina” to share with his family.

Thanks to his enterprising spirit and support from his family, Eustaquio works in construction. He’s a master builder and starting very early in the morning spends about 10 hours daily at work.  He can have an average of five customers per month.  He is happy doing his work.

Eustaquio is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to the support provided he will be able to buy supplies like lumber, nails, buckets and rope, among others, for his work.  In this way, Eustaquio will have the necessary tools on hand to do his work and be able to tend to more customers thus increasing his income which he hopes to use for his young son’s education and wellbeing.

loans.use: to buy materials and supplies.

loans.name: Griselda Ilmer

texts.es:
La Señora Griselda, es socia del banco comunal “Nuevo Edén”. Distrito Yarinacocha, Departamento de Ucayali, tiene 33 años, está casada y tiene dos hijos menores.
Su negocio lo inició con S/. 300.00 nuevos soles que fue su primer préstamo y vendía golosinas en la esquina de la plaza de su distrito, luego se propuso y compró un terreno y ahora tiene su propio negocio en su casa, ella se dedica a la venta de gaseosas, agua mineral y cervezas, más adelante desea tener una gran distribuidora.
Con su nuevo préstamo de S/. 1,700.00 nuevos soles comprara: 35 cajas de cerveza, 5 cajas La de gaseosas personales, 2 paquetes de agua mineral.
Con mucho trabajo está logrando sus metas para mejorar la situación económica de toda su familia, agradece a Manuela Ramos por la ayuda económica prestada para poder iniciar su negocio y de esa manera poder contribuir en su hogar
texts.en:
Griselda is a member of the Nuevo Edén Communal Bank in the district of Yarinacocha, Ucayali Department.  She is 33 years old, married, and she has two young children.

She started her business with 300 nuevos soles, which was her first loan, and she sold candy on the corner of her district's main square.  She then set out to buy some land, and she now has her own business in her home.  She sells soft drinks, mineral water, and beer.  In the future, she would like to have a large distributor.  

With her new loan of 1,700 nuevos soles, she will buy 35 cases of beer, 5 cases of personal soft drinks, and 2 packs of mineral water.  

She is achieving her goals through a lot of work in order to improve her family's financial situation.  She is thankful to Manuela Ramos for the financial help she has been offered to be able to start her business and thereby contribute to her household.

loans.use: to purchase sodas, beer, and mineral water for resale

loans.name: Reyna Isabel

texts.es: Reyna Isabel de 37 años de edad, soltera con 4 hijos menores de edad, tiene por actividad económica un acopia de marisco en general, tiene  8 años de tener el negocio , esta ubicado  en una  zona costera y su mayor actividad es la pesca, el negocio lo aprendió del esposo que es marino y hoy en día ha obtenido buenos ingresos gracias a su experiencia, el objetivo del préstamo es invertir en el productos que son los mariscos, como: punches, camarones, jaibas, pescados boca colorada, pardos, entre otros.
texts.en: Reyna Isabel, 37, is single and has four minor children.  Her economic activity is selling seafood in general.  She’s had the business for 8 years and it’s located in a coastal zone whose main activity is fishing.  She learned the business from her husband who is a sailor and today earns good income thanks to her experience.  The goal of the loan is to invest in seafood products like ‘punches’ [type of crab], shrimp, crabs, red-mouth fish and snapper, among others.

loans.use: to buy seafood.

loans.name: Suyapa Ivonne

texts.es: Suyapa Ivonne de 28 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de desempeña como locutor de radio, con dos hijos (gemelos) de dos meses de edad, el objetivo del préstamo es realizar mejoras en su casa de habitación, las cuales consisten en instalar el piso en el cuarto, hacer un anexo en el porche de la casa, los sueños y metas de Suyapa es en un futuro arreglar bien su casita, con el financiamiento comprara material de construcción como: zinc, cemento, arena, piedrin, clavos, pintura, hierro entre otros.
texts.en:
Suyapa Ivonne, 28 years old, married, and with 2 children, now works as a radio announcer. Her children are twins, 2 month old. The objective of her loan is to make improvements to her residence, including installing a floor in one room and constructing an annex to the porch of the house.

Suyapa's dreams and goals for the future include improving her little house. With this financing, she will purchase construction materials such as zinc roofing, cement, sand, gravel, nails, paint, and iron, among other items.

loans.use: buy zinc sheeting, cement, sand, gravel, nails, paint, and iron among other construction materials.

loans.name: Florencia

texts.es: Florencia tiene 33 años de edad, vive en Bolivia en el Departamento de Cochabamba estudio hasta el nivel primario no pudo culminar sus estudios, no contaba con recursos económicos en su familia, es casada y no convive mucho con su marido ya que él viaja constantemente a Chile pero le ayuda con los gastos familiares, de lo cual tiene 3 pequeños hijos, uno de sus hijos estudia esta en el nivel básico y los otros dos son pequeños. Florencia se dedica a la comercialización por mayor y menor de frutillas y verduras, desde muy temprano de la mañana ella viaja a Pocona para traer su mercadería para su comercialización, durante su viaje les deja a sus hijos a cargo a su cuñada. El crédito que solicita es para capital de operación, ya que ella quiere crecer con su negocio de comercialización y así mejorar sus ingresos familiares y darles una mejor vida a sus pequeños  hijos.
texts.en:
Florencia, 33, lives in Bolivia in Cochabamba Department.  She attended primary school but was unable to complete her schooling because her family lacked the economic resources to do so.  She’s married but does not spend much time with her husband because he travels to Chile constantly but helps her with household expenses.  She has three small children.  One of them attends primary school and the other two are still too young.

Florencia sells fruit and vegetables at wholesale.  Starting very early in the morning she travels to Pocona to get merchandise to sell.  During her trip she leaves her children with her sister-in-law.

The loan she’s requesting is for operating capital since she wants to grow in her business and improve her family income to give her little children a better life.

loans.use: Capital de operación.

loans.name: Dilma

texts.es:
Doña Dilma, tiene 44 años de edad, es soltera por viudez, tiene 8 hijos, pero le acompañan solo 4 de ellos, vive en el municipio de las vegas Santa Bárbara.
Desde joven se ha dedicado a la agricultura, y hace 20 años que cultiva, hortalizas, bananos y vegetales. Ella aprovecha la zona que es apta para estos cultivos y la producción la vende en el mercado local. El préstamo que solicita es por 7,000 Lempiras y lo invertirá en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, abonos para cultivar zanahoria, remolacha, cilantro fino y rábano. Ella espera sacar mejores cosechas con esta inversión ya que este cultivo necesita ser fertilizado. Su meta es continuar produciendo  para obtener ingresos que mejoren la calidad de vida de sus hijos.
texts.en:
Doña Dilma is 44 years old and single as a result of becoming a widow. She has eight children, but only four of them live with her. Dilma lives in the town of Las Vegas, Santa Bárbara.

From a young age, Dilma has engaged in agriculture. For the past 20 years, she has been growing greens, bananas, and vegetables. She takes advantage of this area since it is suitable for growing these products. Whatever she produces is sold at the local market.

The loan she is requesting is in the amount of 7,000 HNL and will be invested in the purchase of supplies, fertilizers, and compost for growing carrots, beets, fine cilantro, and radishes. She hopes to obtain a better harvest with this investment since her crops are in need of fertilizer. Her goal is to continue producing so that she can generate more income and improve the quality of life for her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizers, and compost for her crops.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es:
Nelly esta casada y no tiene hijos, vive en una casa en anticrético ocupando tres habitaciones, la casa esta ubicada en la zona Gran Poder de la ciudad de La Paz.
Ella estudió solo hasta terminar la secundaria y actualmente trabaja como costurera junto a su esposo elaborando ropa de diferentes entidades militares y policiales trabajando por más de doce horas al día ya que debe cumplir con el pago de alquiler de su taller, alimentación y pago de servicios básicos de su familia.
El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para la compra de telas con cantidad y con el crédito logrará adquirir telas por mayor para posteriormente confeccionar y vender sus productos.
El sueño de Nelly es tener su casa propia y ampliar su taller de esta forma mejorar sus ingresos y su calidad de vida.
Es la segunda vez que solicita crédito en IMPRO y la primera junto a KIVA.
En la foto adjunta, Nelly aparece al lado de su esposo.
texts.en:
Nelly is married and has no children.  She lives in a rented house and occupies three rooms.  The house is located in the District of Gran Poder in the city of La Paz.

Nelly only has a high school education and currently works as a seamstress alongside her husband.  They produce clothes for the various armed forces and the police.  She works more than 12 hours a day so that she can pay the rent on her workshop, as well as food and basic services for her family.  The loan she is requesting will be used to buy raw materials since does not earn enough to buy fabrics in quantity.  With the loan, Nelly will be able to buy fabrics in bulk for making and selling her products.  

Nelly dreams of having a house of her own and expanding her workshop so that she can improve her income and her quality of life.  This is the second time she has requested a loan from IMPRO, but the first time with Kiva.  In the photo, Nelly appears next to her husband.

loans.use: to buy materials.

loans.name: Anahit

texts.en:
Anahit has been running a clothes trading business for over 10 years in Vanadzor city. She rents a stall at the central clothes fair. Anahit sells women’s and men’s clothes as well. She buys merchandise form Yerevan’s wholesale markets once a week. 

Anahit likes her occupation very much. She is very sociable and thanks to that and to her wide choice of clothes, Anahit has many regular customers. 

Anahit is 44 years old. Right now she lives with her parents, as her husband and her son live in Russia. Anahit’s mother is retired, and her father works as a metalworker at a factory. Anahit’s business is the main source of income for her family.

This is Anahit’s 4th loan from Nor Horizon and now she is seeking a 400,000 AMD loan to buy an autumn clothes assortment to resell. Anahit has never delayed her loan repayments.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of autumn clothes  to resell

loans.name: Julio Rodolfo

texts.es: Julio Rodolfo de 38 años de edad, es una persona muy responsable quien junto a su esposa trabajan arduamente por sacar adelante a sus dos hijos. Julio cuenta con un terreno en el que se dedica a la siembra de maíz, que posteriormente comercializa en diferentes mercados. Así mismo para contar con una fuente de ingresos adicionales, él posee una tienda de productos perecederos, en la cual vende: pan, huevos, leche, productos de belleza, frutas y verduras entre otros más, con este negocio le ayuda su esposa. Como todo padre responsable Julio desea mejorar la economía de su hogar por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de maíz para sembrar, así mismo para comercializar mayor variedad de productos en su tienda, lo que le permitirá contar con más clientes fijos, lo que será de mucho beneficio para su familia.
texts.en:
Julio Rodolfo, age 38, is a very responsible person. He and his wife work hard so that their two children can get ahead. Julio has a plot of land on which he grows corn that he eventually sells at different markets. At the same time, he generates additional income by managing a store where he sells perishable products such as bread, eggs, milk, fruit, vegetables, as well as beauty products and other merchandise. He manages this business with the help of his wife.

Like all responsible fathers, Julio wants to improve his household finances so he is requesting a loan from Apoyo Integral in order to have the necessary funds to invest in planting corn. He will also be able to sell a wider variety of products from his store so that he can acquire more established customers. This will be a great benefit for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for planting corn.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
Maria Cristina es una joven emprendedora de 22 años de edad que decidió montar su propio negocio y esforzarse para brindar a sus padres la posibilidad de gozar de una mejor calidad de vida y mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar. Desde hace mucho tiempo aprendió la actividad de la fabricación de artesanías, y desde su casa comenzó a fabricar algunas piezas que vendía a sus familiares y amigos. Poco a poco su negocio fue creciendo hasta que hace un mes tuvo la oportunidad de trasladarse a un local donde ahora puede ofrecer sus productos a sus clientes y tiene la oportunidad de atender a una gran cantidad de personas. Desde que su negocio viene creciendo, la situación económica en su hogar ha mejorado, y aunque los problemas económicos no han dejado de aparecer, por lo menos han tenido la oportunidad de gozar de mejores condiciones de vida y poco a poco salir adelante. Debido a que no cuenta con un gran capital que le permita crecer con su negocio, Maria Cristina busca un préstamo para comprar materias primas como madera, pegamento, pinturas para la elaboración de las artesanías y comprar un aviso para su negocio.

Su sueño es llegar a tener un gran local donde pueda atender a una gran cantidad de personas y donde también pueda generar empleo para las personas más necesitadas. Además, sueña con que sus padres puedan salir adelante y superar las dificultades que se les han presentado en la vida.
texts.en:
Maria Cristina is a young 22 year old entrepreneur who decided to start her own business and make an effort to offer her parents the possibility of having a better quality of life and better economic opportunity towards progress.  Some time ago she learned how to make arts and crafts and began making them out of her home and selling them to family and friends.  Her business began growing little by little and a month ago she got the opportunity to move to a location where she can offer her products to her current clients and be exposed to a wider variety of people.  Since her business started growing, the economic situation at home has also improved but not disappeared completely.  At the very least they've gotten to enjoy an improved quality of life and little by little they are getting ahead.  Due to the fact that she doesn't have large capital to grow her business, Maria Cristina is seeking a loan to purchase raw materials, such as:  wood, glue, paints to make arts and crafts and to purchase a sign for her business.

Her dream is to have a larger store where she can serve a larger quantity of people and where she can also generate employment for the most at need.  She also dreams of her parents being able to prosper and get past the difficulties that have been present in their lives.

loans.use: to purchase raw material such as: wood, glue, paints to make arts and crafts and to purchase a sign for her business.
